title: Inventory reports and stock certificates
dataVerified: Warehouse operator, depositor, inventory quantities, lot numbers, valuation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents inventory inflation fraud. Domain binding verifies warehouse operator. Lender audit verification (asset-based lending). Prevents fake inventory (collateral fraud).
